articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn
articles.title: Why every Costco product is called 'Kirkland Signature' - CTV News
articles.description: Costco's Kirkland Signature brand is perhaps America's weirdest private label, but it's also shockingly successful. Kirkland raked in US$58 billion in sales during Costco's latest fiscal year, making up around a quarter of the company's total revenue.
articles.content:
Costco's Kirkland Signature brand is perhaps America's weirdest private label. You can put Kirkland Signature AA batteries alongside Kirkland Signature cashews in your shopping cart.

articles.author: Amanda Stephenson
articles.title: Gasoline prices breaking records as crude oil tops US$90 a barrel - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Gasoline prices across Canada shattered an all-time record high on Friday, as crude prices soared above US$90 per barrel and North American refineries worked full throttle to keep up with demand.
